title: Device API Cradles Automapping Settings
description: Settings for automapping Cradle to Entrance Unit

enableCradleAutomapping.description: Enable automapping for cradles to entrance units.

cradleDataRowRegex.description: Regex pattern for extracting row number from CradleData.

cradleDataColRegex.description: Regex pattern for extracting column number from CradleData.

cradleDataEuFriendlyNameRegex.description: Regex pattern for extracting EU friendly name (WallNo) from CradleData.
